mapper.sql: id, leibie_id, leibie_name, xinghao, zhizaoshang, num, goumai_time, create_time, bumen_id, bumen_name, shebeizhuangkuang, flag, type, remark, status, shebei_id, user_id, user_name, create_user_id, create_user_name,end_time
mapper.select: SELECT id, leibie_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM type_info a WHERE a.id = c.leibie_id ) leibie_name, xinghao, zhizaoshang, num, goumai_time, DATE_FORMAT( goumai_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) startTimeStr, create_time, bumen_id, bumen_name, shebeizhuangkuang, flag, type, remark, status, shebei_id, user_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM sys_user a WHERE a.user_id = c.user_id ) user_name, create_user_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM sys_user a WHERE a.user_id = c.create_user_id ) create_user_name, end_time, DATE_FORMAT( end_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) endTimeStr FROM shebei_info c where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into shebei_info (id, leibie_id, leibie_name, xinghao, zhizaoshang, num, goumai_time, create_time, bumen_id, bumen_name, shebeizhuangkuang, flag, type, remark, status, shebei_id, user_id, user_name, create_user_id, create_user_name, end_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leibieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leibieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xinghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhizaoshang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goumaiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shebeizhuangkuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shebeiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
